mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NUM, TL.USER_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, BOARD_UPLOAD_DATE, BOARD_EDIT_DATE, USER_NICK FROM TBL_BOARD UL LEFT JOIN TBL_USER TL ON UL.USER_NUM = TL.USER_NUM

SELECT BOARD_NUM, tu.USER_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, BOARD_UPLOAD_DATE, BOARD_EDIT_DATE, tu.USER_NICK FROM TBL_BOARD tb INNER JOIN TBL_USER tu ON tb.USER_NUM = tu.USER_NUM WHERE tb.BOARD_TITLE LIKE #{keyword} OR tu.USER_NICK LIKE #{keyword} ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC

SELECT BOARD_NUM, TL.USER_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, BOARD_UPLOAD_DATE, BOARD_EDIT_DATE, USER_NICK FROM TBL_BOARD TB LEFT JOIN TBL_USER TL ON TB.USER_NUM = TL.USER_NUM WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD (BOARD_NUM, USER_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS) VALUES (seq_board.NEXTVAL, #{userNum}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents})
